name: Where is Fluffy?
description:
It's the middle of the night... It's dark, the wind is howling, and Robin is scared... They want to grab Fluffy and hold him close but he's not there! Where is Fluffy?

Gameplay instruction: You press E to continue in dialogue but you need to press enter to select a dialogue option.

Made by a multidisciplinary team of HKU students:
  • Yasmine Aarts - Character design & animation
  • Sterre Eijk - Monster design & animation
  • Simone Abbring - Environment design
  • Naomi Aalbers - Dialogue writing
  • Casper van Battum - Programming & game assembly
  • And special thanks to Tim de Jongh who offered to create a soundtrack for our game! 

Made with Unity 2021 & Yarn Spinner (https://yarnspinner.dev/)

Special thanks to Christian Roth for teaching this course!

Interested in the source code? It's on GitHub!
